original_text: Jesus then said, ‘I have told you all these things, so that you will not turn away from God.
korean_text: 내가 이것을 너희에게 이름은 너희로 실족하지 않게 하려 함이니

sentences.original_text: I have told you all these things
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너희에게 이 모든 것을 말해왔다

sentences.original_text: so that you will not turn away from God
